content.title: Welcome to the UnrealNET Cluster!
content.text:
Welcome to the cluster.

Thanks for joining our All-Map ARK: Survival Ascended PvE cluster.
We focus on a friendly, fair and lag-free experience for all players.

The main focus of this cluster: I'm a working father of two daughters, i need validation in my gameplay. This is what the cluster is build around. Not too grindy, not too speedy.

Features:
• all current and future maps included
• Quality of Life mods
• Balanced settings
• Active admins & community









Issues / Suggestion?
• Join the Discord: https://discord.unrealdj.nl (Or press the button at the lower left)  
• Open an ticket using the "create ticket" under the server support section

content.title: Rules
content.text:
Core Rules (Short Overview)

• No pillar/foundation claiming — build a real base or don’t build there
• Respect other bases and give space
• No griefing, harassment, or luring wild dinos to bases
• No building in caves, obelisks, boss areas, or important resource spawns
• 1 main base per tribe per map
• Outposts and "pretty builds" allowed. 
• PvE only — no stealing, no killing tames
• No exploiting, duping, or mesh building
• Inactive bases removed after 30 days

Full rules are available on Discord

content.title: Cluster Settings
content.text:
General Settings
• XP: 1
• Harvest: 2
• Taming: 3
• Breeding speed, maturation, and imprinting tuned for quality-of-life
• Slightly boosted player and dino stats (balanced, not OP)

Server Features
• All maps connected through cluster transfer
• Fast flyers enabled 
• Player/tribe limits optimized for performance
• Cross-ARK item & dino transfers enabled where supported

Performance Goals
• Clean world
• Low clutter
• Cryo unused tames
• No spam building or abandoned structures

content.text:

content.title: Parental Advisory Discord Server
content.text:
The parental Advisory Discord Server has been absolutely amazing in allowing us to host their main ARK Cluster. A lot of our players come from this server.
